original_text:
then you shall take delight in the Lord,
    and I will make you ride on the heights of the earth;
I will feed you with the heritage of Jacob your father,
    for the mouth of the Lord has spoken.”
korean_text: 네가 여호와 안에서 즐거움을 얻을 것이라 내가 너를 땅의 높은 곳에 올리고 네 조상 야곱의 기업으로 기르리라 여호와의 입의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: then you shall take delight in the Lord,
and I will make you ride on the heights of the earth;
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 땅의 높은 곳에 태우고

sentences.original_text: I will feed you with the heritage of Jacob your father,
sentences.korean_translation: 네 아비 야곱의 유업으로 너를 먹이리니

sentences.original_text: for the mouth of the Lord has spoken.”
